title: EXPERIENCED SHORT FORM VIDEO EDITOR | Flexi Schedule
description:
We’re hiring someone who knows how to turn long-form content into sharp, high-retention short videos for platforms like TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.



This role is for someone who understands pacing, hooks, and visual rhythm in short-form content, and knows how to edit with intention rather than just cutting clips.



—-----------------------------------------------------------------------------



READ THE ENTIRE JOB LISTING CAREFULLY. The final step of the hiring process will require the candidate to provide at least 1 former employer/team lead reference and at least 1 character reference. These will be verified prior to extending an offer.



--- ABOUT THE TEAM ---

Want to work in a rewarding, fast-paced, start-up atmosphere? Looking for significant growth and performance bonus opportunities? Have a growth mindset, value relationships, and dedicated to getting results? Then we might be a fit!



What is it like to work with us? HEAR FROM OUR TEAM!   





Our Core Values:

1) DELIGHT THE CLIENT:  We consistently exceed expectations by anticipating needs, delivering outstanding service, and creating those “magic 
nts” where every client feels seen and heard.

2) MASTER YOUR CRAFT:  We commit to continuous learning, share our expertise openly, and tackle every challenge with precision and a deep sense of duty.

3) FOLLOW THROUGH, ALWAYS:  When we say something will happen, it does—every time. We own every task, ensuring that nothing falls through the cracks, and when mistakes occur, we learn and improve immediately.



Our core values are important and the right candidate will share our values. We are building an awesome place to work, not just cutting together videos for our real estate business.



--- ABOUT YOU ---

Do you have strong creative instincts and know how to spot 
nts that make people stop scrolling? Are you proactive, adaptable, and detail-oriented? Do you have a sharp sense of pacing, an instinct for hooks, and a clear understanding of how short-form videos need to flow to hold attention? Do you take pride in clean edits and delivering videos that feel intentional and finished? Do our core values sound like a fit for who you are?



Then keep reading to see if we're a fit!



Responsibilities:

Short-Form Editing & Story Selection

- Review long-form videos, transcripts, or raw footage to identify short-form clip opportunities

- Select 
nts that are clear, engaging, and platform-appropriate

- Edit vertical videos optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts

- Create strong hooks, clean cuts, and natural pacing

- Deliver publish-ready videos that meet brand and platform standards



Captions, Visuals & Formatting

- Add on-screen captions (burned-in or SRT as required) with proper timing and readability

- Apply basic motion, zooms, punch-ins, and visual emphasis where appropriate

- Follow platform-specific formatting (aspect ratio, duration, safe margins)



Iteration & Workflow

- Implement feedback efficiently and meet agreed turnaround times

- Maintain clear file naming and folder organization

- Track edits, revisions, and delivery status as required



Requirements:

- A STABLE, HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION, REQUIRED (at least 150mbps)

- Experience with Final Cut Pro X (or other editing software, such as Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro) is required

- Strong preference for MacOS users

- Experience editing short-form vertical content for social platforms, required

- Strong understanding of short-form pacing, hooks, and retention

- Experience working from transcripts or long-form content, required

- Clean file organization and understanding of post-production workflow

- Portfolio of completed short-form video projects, required

- General understanding of brand, content marketing, YouTube, etc, required

- GREAT interpersonal and communication skills, required

- Ability to self-start, work on a tight schedule, and manage multiple project deadlines, required

- Ability to follow directions and a LOVE of completing lots of projects according to consistent specifications, required

- Growth mindset, required



--- APPLICATION & RECRUITMENT PROCESS ---

STEP 1:

Fill out the application form through the link below and write "green kangaroo" in the Additional Comments field.


 



STEP 2:

Qualified candidates may be invited to participate in two PAID test projects, $10-20 USD for each test project estimated to be 2-3hrs of work for each (a total of $40 USD!).



STEP 3:

Candidates who advance through the test project rounds will be invited to an interview.



STEP 4:

Before extending a trial offer, we will conduct a CHARACTER REFERENCE CHECK for the final candidate(s). CONDUCTING A REFERENCE CHECK will be the last step in the hiring process.



STEP 5:

Upon receiving a trial offer, you will be onboarded as a Video Editor with a 90-day PAID trial period. During this period, we expect you to demonstrate your video editing expertise, meet project deadlines, be a team player, and excel at what you do. A successful trial will lead to a permanent offer to join the team.

title: YouTube Video Editor Wanted, Transformative Facts/Commentary Content
description:
We run a growing YouTube channel in the facts and commentary niche, and we're looking for a sharp editor who gets what it takes to produce content that is both engaging and YouTube-policy compliant. Watch this channel as a reference for the style we're going for: 

The Editing Standard We Expect

- Continuous transitions between every clip and segment, dead cuts are not acceptable

- Effects and sound effects throughout, not sprinkled occasionally, but woven into the fabric of every scene

- Audio transformation on every visual change, every time an image or clip enters or exits the screen, a sound effect must land with it. This is non-negotiable and is a key part of making our content transformative in both audio and visual dimensions

- Clip cutting and merging instinct, you should have a natural sense of rhythm, knowing exactly when to cut, hold, or transition

- Voiceover-first editing mindset, all edits serve the narration; visuals must match exactly what is being discussed at every 
nt

- Reference and fact-based formatting, our content shares unique sourced information; your editing must present it with credibility and clarity

You Must Understand:

YouTube's transformation standards. Editors who don't know the difference between a claim-safe edit and a lazy reupload will not be considered. Your editing choices are our first line of defense.

To Apply, Send:

- Your intro and editing background

- 2–3 YouTube video samples you've edited

- Confirmation that you've 
 and a one-line note on what you noticed about the editing style

- Your rate per video and average turnaround time

title: DevOps/Senior Full Stack Developer
description:
We are on the hunt for a DevOps/Senior Full Stack Developer who embodies technical prowess and thrives in an environment where hard work, direct communication, and good humour are a staple of our day. If you’re ready to contribute to a team that pushes the envelope while rowing towards a common mission, you might just be the ideal candidate.



In this role, your responsibilities will span several critical technology domains:

API and Automation Development: You will be responsible for maintaining and building our internal APIs and automations, ensuring optimal functionality and adaptability to meet our needs. You will also work on our internal tools.

Customer Integration Support: You will assist our customer-facing team with integrating our solutions into client CRMs and other APIs, facilitating efficient and seamless interactions.

Software Maintenance: Working alongside our COO, you will help maintain and enhance our internal proprietary lead distribution software, which is pivotal for managing lead capture, validation and distribution to client APIs. This software acts as the business OS.

Innovation and Creative Development: Innovation is at our core. You’ll have the chance to work with cutting-edge technologies, including AI, and engage in ambitious projects where you can unleash your creative potential and have a significant hand in their development from start to finish. 



About You:

Experience: You should have at least 5 years of robust experience in full-stack development, with strong expertise in Node.js, Express, and SQL databases. Proficiency in JavaScript and API’s is essential, Experience with Zapier, N8N and CRM’s(Mautic, Pipedrive etc..). Python and React(MUI) knowledge is also good to have but not required.

Industry Knowledge: A background in marketing technologies and CRM systems is highly favoured, enabling you to effectively support our bespoke needs and customer integrations.

Work Ethic: You are known for your drive, diligence, and commitment to excellence, thriving in an environment free of BS and big egos, ready to face challenges head-on.

Culture Fit: You appreciate a team-oriented atmosphere where everyone contributes and maintains a spirited demeanour, even under pressure. You are dedicated to our collective mission and ready to make a positive impact on our team dynamics.



How to Apply:

If you’re excited about making a substantial impact and pushing the boundaries of technology with a team that blends hard work with fun, we want to hear from you. Send us your CV and a cover letter explaining why you’re the perfect fit for this role. During the application process, we will require you to verify your identity to maintain the authenticity of our hiring process.

title: U.S. Mortgage Processor (Remote Night Shift)
description:
As a Mortgage Loan Processor, you will be responsible for managing and processing mortgage loan files from initial opening through closing. You’ll work closely with loan officers, underwriters, title companies, and clients to ensure all required documentation is complete, accurate, and compliant with lending guidelines.

________________________________________

Key Responsibilities:

• Communicate professionally with clients via phone and
.

• Manage pipeline of mortgage loan files, ensuring all deadlines are met.

• Review initial loan applications for completeness and accuracy.

• Order and review third-party documentation (credit reports, title, appraisal, VOE, homeowners’ insurance, etc.).

• Communicate with borrowers and loan officers to obtain required conditions.

• Submit complete loan files to underwriting and follow up on conditions.

• Coordinate with underwriters, title companies, and closing agents to facilitate smooth closings.

• Maintain compliance with lending, investor, and regulatory guidelines (FHA, VA, Conventional, USDA and Non-QM).

• Update loan status and maintain detailed notes in the loan origination system (LOS) & CRM.

• Proactively identify potential issues and resolve them before closing (income, bank statements, LOX, etc).

________________________________________

Qualifications:

• 2+ years of experience in mortgage loan processing with full-cycle processing knowledge.

• Strong understanding of Conventional, FHA, VA, USDA and Non-QM guidelines.

• Familiarity with loan origination systems (e.g., Encompass, Arrive, Byte).

• Excellent communication, time management, and organizational skills.

• Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple files simultaneously.

• Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a high-volume environment.

________________________________________

Preferred Qualifications:

• Knowledge of compliance regulations (TRID, RESPA, HMDA).

• Experience working with retail or wholesale channels.

• Excellent written and spoken English communication skills (C1 Advanced or higher)

• Availability to work during U.S. business hours (night shift)

• A stable work-from-home setup, including high-speed internet, a reliable computer, and a quiet work environment

• Experience using AUS systems like DU and LP



Compensation:

• Starting Base salary: $1,150 - $1,500/month*

• Step-Up Increase: Eligible for a salary increase after successful completion of a 90-day introductory period, based on performance and training milestones

• Performance-Based Bonuses: Opportunity to earn monthly tied to file volume, accuracy, and turnaround times



If you're dependable, self-motivated, and ready to contribute to a dynamic mortgage team, we want to hear from you!



*** To Apply:



- Complete the following questionnaire: 
/to/Qit8ufEQ

- Reply via online jobs with a 1-2 minute video covering your U.S. Mortgage Processing experience and provide the best number to reach you via WhatsApp.



(Applicants must have a minimum of 1 year of experience in the mortgage industry. Applications that do not meet this requirement will not be considered. Please ensure you follow the application instructions carefully.)

title: GoHighLevel (GHL) + WordPress Systems VA  (Funnels, Automations, Integrations, Email Fix)
description:
Type: Hourly — Full-Time preferred (40 hrs/week) or Part-Time (20 hrs/week)

Schedule: Flexible hours except mandatory 8:30 AM CST daily tea
eting (15–30 minutes)

READ THE ENTIRE JOB POST, OR YOU WILL NOT BE INTERVIEWED!

About Us



We operate a high-volume lead business. My services include business funding, credit repair, business credit building, and business coaching. Your job is to keep our GoHighLevel + WordPress (Bluehost) systems running smoothly and consistently. We need a reliable operator who can build funnels and automations, troubleshoot issues fast, and improve system quality so leads don’t get missed.



This is not a beginner VA role. This is a systems + implementation role.



What You Own (Outcomes)



Website pages + landing pages are updated, mobile-clean, and stable



Funnels are built correctly and connect to GHL cleanly



Automations route leads, assign ownership, follow up, and notify the team correctly



Integrations do not break (Zapier/webhooks/forms)



/SMS deliverability is set up correctly and monitored



Everything is documented (Loom + simple SOP)



Key Responsibilities

1) GoHighLevel (Core)



Build and maintain: funnels, forms, surveys, calendars, pipelines



Build and maintain: workflows/automations (tagging, lead routing, follow-up sequences, round-robin logic, tasks, notifications)



Troubleshoot and fix: missed assignments, broken triggers, failed appointment bookings, duplicate records, workflow conflicts



QA testing: verify every funnel/form produces the correct outcome end-to-end



Maintain organized tags, custom fields, pipeline stages, and automation naming conventions



2) WordPress (Bluehost) + Website Updates



Create/update landing pages and website pages in WordPress

 deliverability troubleshooting experience

 issue (deliverability/configuration)

title: Senior Business Funding Specialist (Credit-Based, Remote)
description:
Description:

Are you a driven, experienced closer who understands credit-based funding, stacking strategies, and how to help U.S. business owners get access to $50K–$250K in capital?



We’re a fast-growing U.S. funding company that helps entrepreneurs get the money they need to scale — without offering our own capital.



We’re hiring a Senior Funding Specialist who knows how to:



Speak with pre-qualified, credit-worthy leads



Understand personal and business credit



Recommend funding options from multiple banks



Help clients through the approval process



Work remotely in a fast-paced, performance-driven team



Responsibilities:



Take inbound and scheduled funding calls from clients with 700+ credit scores



Pre-screen applicants and verify readiness



Present credit card stacking or LOC options



Close deals and pass to processors



Hit KPIs for weekly funded deals



Qualifications:



1+ years of experience in funding, or credit-based products (required)



Strong understanding of credit scores, utilization, and stacking strategies



Excellent English communication (C1+)



Ability to follow SOPs and CRM processes (GoHighLevel or similar)



Strong closing ability and confidence speaking with U.S. clients



Compensation:



Base pay: $800–$1,600/month (based on experience)



Commissions: $300–$1,500+ per funded client



Bonuses + incentives based on monthly funded volume



Tools we use:

 GHL, Zoom, Whatsapp, CRM & automation tools



Make sure to add "I am a funding machine" at the top of your application!



1. Have you ever worked in a funding company before?

2. Can you work 50+ hours every week monday thru friday?

3. if you have any, what were your daily tasks in the funding company?

4. Why should we hire you? What can you bring to the team to help us grow?

title: Sales Team / Sales Closer
description:
We are looking to hire 6 sales reps to join our growing company. We are gaining close to 100 new clients every month and we want to get up to 250 new clients in total.



I also need 4 Sales Closers for my funding company. We help business owners get funding from different banks and lenders but we will be requiring payments up front soon, and I need Closers to close the deals and collect the payments.



You will be paid every week. You will be paid on an hourly basis, plus a 5% commission on every deal that you sell.  

READ THIS FULL JOB DESCRIPTION IF YOU ARE INTERESTED!



You would be in charge of calling leads and signing up clients. I have an assistant that will handle disputes and customer service you would just be in charge of getting new clients by using sales skills to get them to sign up for the service. We also pay weekly bonuses depending on performance. There are not many details for this position. We need someone that is fluent in English speaking and writing. We will provide warm leads daily from businesses and individuals. If you are highly motivated and want to make a lot of money, this is the position for you. If you are good in this position, we also have a ton of training available for continuous growth.

If you are interested in this position, write "I am a sales addict" at the top of your application.



Our requirements are only that you must already have a lot of sales experience.

If the clients do not sign up for credit repair now, you will put them into a CRM and they will be sent automatic
s and sms from our drip campaign. You can then follow up with them continuously. This position does not involve cold calling. All of our leads are warm leads!



We do daily sales trainings every morning on zoom. 

You must be able to work at least 50 hours per week, Monday through Friday.



Do not send me any prewritten messages that you send to everyone else.



If you really want this position, prove it.



I am only looking for highly motivated and determined sales professionals.



You must speak Fluent English.



You must have previous experience closing credit repair sales or other sales.



You must have great internet.



You must be energetic and Upbeat on the phone with clients.



We already have the warm leads you just need to close them. '



This position pays hourly and commission.

Commission starts at $50 up to $225 per sale on average with a lot of room for increases.



DO NOT APPLY IF YOU ARE NOT SERIOUS.



1. How long have you done credit repair sales or funding for?

2. What other sales have you done?

3. What other skills do have that make you a good fit for this position?

4. Are you looking for full time or part time work?

5. How much were the products that you were selling?

6. How long have you been in sales all together?



Send over a voice recording with your application.

title: TikTok Shop Executive Assistant
description:
Mission For TikTok Shop Executive Assistant



To track tangible results and identify revenue generating creators for TikTok Shop brands by:

Finding creators’ TikTok usernames from their Discord handles

Creating creator campaigns on Growi and inputting creators’ Tiktok handles

Sorting through Discord server members to identify top-performing TikTok Shop creators

Reaching out to creators to be a part of 7-day posting cohorts

Handling additional weekly tasks that are assigned

Outputs // KPIs:

Track results and identify revenue generating creators

You’ll achieve this through these primary methods:

Finding creators’ TikTok usernames from their Discord handles

We host weekly coaching calls on Discord for each of our brands. We will give you a list of creators who attended each and you will find their TikTok handles.

Creating creator campaigns on Growi and inputting creators’ Tiktok handles

Using a creator tracking software called Growi, you will create a separate campaign for each coaching Call. Then, you’ll add each creator who joined the respective call to the campaign using their handle you found earlier.

Sorting through Discord server members to identify top-performing TikTok Shop creators

In all of our brand’s Discord servers, we implement a ticket system that allows us to maintain 1 on 1 communication with all the top creators. 

You will sort through all the members who join the Discord, find out their TikTok handle, and check their L30 day gmv on the TikTok Affiliate Center.

This is vital because it allows us to communicate with as many high potential creators as possible and maximize the number of videos they post.

Reaching out to creators to be a part of 7-day posting cohorts

We host 7 day posting cohorts where we take a group of 5 creators with potential to generate sales, put them in a group chat, and provide one video every day for them to replicate.

You will be in charge of identifying creators to be a part of these posting cohorts. Once you identify top performing TT Shop creators, you’re going to message them privately, asking if they want to be a part of the cohort.

Handling additional weekly tasks that are assigned

Turn new priorities from meetings, Slack, and ad?hoc requests into completed tasks with clear owners, deadlines, and visible progress. Ensure nothing falls through the cracks. 

Daily execution of team & administrative tasks

In addition to coaching the creators and maintaining these relationships, you will have a minimal amount of administrative tasks.

Daily Check-Ins:

Provide updates on what tasks you’ve been working on that day.

Report findings of what’s working and what isn’t.

Share ideas for improving client success.

End of Day Report

At the end of each work day, you will be expected to complete a form outlining everything you completed for that day.

Weekly Team Meeting

Attend team check-in meeting via Google Meet every week.



Competencies:

Proficient in English 

Part of your job will require you to outreach hundreds of creators. You must be able to write clear, friendly DMs and hold a proper conversation with creators as needed. 

Communication and responsiveness

You are active on Slack and respond to messages timely.

High ownership and bias to action

You don’t wait for instructions on what to complete each day. You take action relentlessly and own the operations you’re in charge of.

Whenever there’s a new batch of creators that join a brand’s Discord, you immediately begin looking them up on TikTok without me reminding you to.

Every week, there will be new tasks to handle. Upon hearing them, you will immediately spring to action and complete them as soon as possible.

Disciplined

A majority of your job will be manual work, but you’ll manage it at the highest quality. 

You follow instructions exactly, document what you’ve completed every day, and don’t skip steps.

Organized

You will be in charge of tracking hundreds or even thousands of creators. You’re on top of all the work you’re completing, ensuring that you have the proper systems in place to deliver the highest quality possible. 

TikTok Shop Experience

You have experience operating within TikTok Shop Seller Center, Tiktok Shop Affiliate Center, and using tools like Growi. 

You have a deep understanding of how to navigate through these platforms and look up creators usernames to find their L30 Day GMV.





Executive Assistant Position Description:

Time

You will have the freedom to make your own schedule. That said, it is crucial that you have access to the necessary tools (Slack) to handle replies during work hours

You will be expected to complete your end of day tasks every day Monday-Friday.

You will also be expected to be online M-F from 8am - 5pm EST: replying to creator messages and communicating through slack.

This position is remote, so you will have the freedom to work from anywhere. Please ensure that you have a strong connection and there are minimal distractions when on calls with clients.

Compensation

$1000/mo full time

Potential for added bonuses depending on performance



Please film a 5 minute max loom explaining:

1. Previous experience you've had with TikTok Shop - brands you've worked with, results you've driven, etc. Only people with TikTok Shop experience will be considered.

2. Why you are a good fit for the position.

3. How to find a creators' last 30 day gmv generated. Share your screen and show yourself walking through this.

title: Performance Marketing + Tracking & Analytics Specialist  (Google Ads / Meta / GoHighLevel)
description:
Performance Marketing + Tracking & Analytics Specialist

 (Google Ads / Meta / GoHighLevel)



Company: Allied Health Consulting (AHC)

Location: Remote (Offshore)

Engagement: Full-Time Contractor (Aligned to Australian Business Hours)



GREAT BENEFITS + PERKS! POTENTIAL SPONSORSHIP.



About Allied Health Consulting



Allied Health Consulting partners with leading dental and allied health clinics across Australia to build measurable, systemised growth engines.

We operate as the outsourced marketing and analytics department for multi-site clinics — focusing on predictable patient acquisition, clean tracking, automation, and ROI visibility.

We build systems, not short-term campaigns.



Role Summary



You will own the full patient acquisition performance loop:

Ad Spend ? Lead ? Booking ? Patient Revenue ? Optimisation.

This is a senior, hands-on technical role responsible for:

Paid traffic performance (Google + Meta)

Conversion tracking integrity

Automation buildout in GoHighLevel

ROI reporting across multiple clinics

You are accountable for cost per booked patient and tracking accuracy across every channel.



Core Responsibilities



1. Paid Advertising (Google + Meta)

Build and manage Google Search and Performance Max campaigns

Execute Meta campaigns with structured retargeting flows

Segment campaigns by clinic, suburb, and service line (e.g. emergency, Invisalign, general)

Deploy localised offers and creative testing frameworks

Continuously reduce cost per booked patient

2. GHL Automation & Lead Systems

Build landing pages, forms, pipelines, and automations in GoHighLevel

Design structured SMS/email follow-up systems

Standardise lead handling workflows across clinics

Reduce speed-to-lead gaps and booking leakage



3. Tracking & Attribution Ownership

GA4 setup and validation

Google Tag Manager implementation

Call tracking configuration

Form tracking and booking attribution

Rapid troubleshooting of broken tracking



4. ROI Reporting & Dashboards



Build simple, action-focused dashboards (Spend ? Leads ? Bookings ? Cost per Patient)

Deliver weekly performance summaries with clear priorities

Present monthly ROI reviews with budget reallocation recommendations

Compare clinic and channel performance transparently



5. Structured Campaign Optimisation



Run systematic tests across ads, landing pages, and retargeting

Expand negatives, refine geos, eliminate poor lead sources

Shift budget toward high-performing services and suburbs

Maintain disciplined account hygiene



Core Deliverables



Live, optimised Google + Meta campaigns per clinic/service

Fully documented tracking setup and logic

Functional GHL pipelines and automations

Weekly performance summary with next actions

Monthly ROI review and budget allocation plan

Live cross-clinic dashboard with cost per booked patient



Required Skills



Advanced Google Ads (Search + PMax)

Strong Meta Ads execution and retargeting strategy

GoHighLevel automation expertise

GA4 + GTM implementation and troubleshooting

Call tracking integration experience

Funnel psychology and buyer intent understanding

Analytical decision-making discipline

Extreme attention to tracking integrity

Healthcare or dental marketing experience is advantageous but not required.



Working Environment



Full-time, aligned with Australian business hours

Remote role with structured reporting

Regular sync meetings with leadership

High autonomy, high accountability



Long-Term Benefits & Stability



Paid annual leave entitlements

13th month pay

Structured salary progression pathway

Year 3 loyalty benefit: Paid holiday for employee + 1 additional person

Long Service Savings Arrangement (commencing Year 4):

 Employer + Employee co-contribution of $50/week

 Lump sum payout at end of Year 8

Australian Sponsorship Pathway between Years 8–10

 (Subject to performance and legal eligibility)

This is a long-term growth role, not a short contract cycle.



Who Should Apply



Technical performance operators who think in ROI, not impressions

Data-driven marketers who value clean tracking

Independent executors who solve problems without supervision

Operators who care about outcomes more than activity

title: Design Engineer
description:
Raven Tanks Australia is seeking a Design Engineer to join our team and support the design, analysis and development of our bolted steel tank systems and related components.



Key Responsibilities

Carry out structural calculations for tank walls, roofs, ring beams,  bases and supporting structures



Ensure compliance with relevant Australian Standards including AS2304, AS4100, AS/NZS 4600, AS/NZS 1170, AS1657 and AS3500



Develop and review tank components including trusses, platforms, ladders, penetrations and hydraulic connections



Prepare clear and accurate engineering documentation including load cases, load analysis summaries, design reports, GA drawings and structural calculation packages



Analyse hydraulic components including flow rates, head pressure, suction lines, inlets, outlets and overflows



Collaborate with sales, operations and project teams throughout the project lifecycle



Review supplier drawings and assess compliance with design requirements



Support engineering development, design optimisation and continuous improvement initiatives



Skills and Experience

Degree in Structural, Civil or Mechanical Engineering



Strong understanding of structural analysis and steel design



Ability to interpret and apply Australian Standards relevant to tank, hydraulic components and access system design.



Experience preparing clear and understandable engineering reports



Proficiency with design and analysis software such as SpaceGass, SAP 2000, Strand7, SolidWorks, Inventor or similar 



Familiarity with hydraulic design concepts including flow and pressure behaviour



Ability to produce accurate drawings and technical documentation



Personal Attributes

Flexible and adaptable, able to work across a range of technical tasks



Strong attention to detail with a commitment to high quality output



Team oriented with a positive and collaborative attitude



Hardworking and dependable with strong time management skills



Practical problem solver with a clear communication style



Able to explain engineering concepts in a way that clients and tea
mbers can easily understand.



Willing to learn, grow and contribute to the overall engineering capability



Willing to work full time, Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM AEST



Highly Desirable

Experience with bolted panel tanks, water storage systems or modular steel structures



Exposure to RPEQ workflows or willingness to work under a certifying engineer



Knowledge of corrosion protection and steel fabrication



Experience with construction or installation processes



What We Offer

Opportunity to help shape engineering capability within a growing multi -national company



Varied design challenges across fire, potable, industrial and wastewater tank projects



Supportive and collaborative team environment



Career development opportunities including pathways toward chartership



Do not apply here. Send a 1-2 minute video to Felix on Whatsapp 
explaining why you're right for the job.

title: CONTENT RESEARCH EXPERT (CRE): $800 a month
description:
BENEFITS



- Full-time position: 7.5 hours/day

- Schedule: Monday to Friday, flexible time

- Salary: $800 a month

- Bi-monthly payments via Wise (direct to your bank account, almost no fees, no waiting for payday!)

- Full work-from-home flexibility

- A young, supportive team that values your output without micromanagement

- Clear growth path with opportunities to expand your role

- Join our international team working with established content creators and brands

- Work with the latest AI tools and social media platforms



TASKS



TASK #1: Research and Curate Viral Content



- Research 30-50 viral short-form videos on Instagram Reels and TikTok

- Strategically select content ideas that will help specific clients go viral

- Organize all content ideas in the "Client Master Sheet"

- Copy/paste links to each content piece

- Write out the hook of each content piece

- Categorize content (Hero Story, Educational, Entertaining, Promotional)

- Add precise video instructions on how each piece can be replicated



TASK #2: Provide Strategic Content Direction



- Analyze client information (niche, target audience, personality, content style)

- Identify and recommend 3 inspirational accounts for clients to follow in their niche

- Create detailed instructions for content replication tailored to the client's abilities

- Think strategically about what will help each client succeed



TASK #3: Administrative Responsibilities



- Maintain a content library categorized by niche for efficient future use

- Complete daily End-of-Day Reports (EOD)

- Attend multiple meetings with your manager each week

- Continuously improve content recommendations based on what works



REQUIREMENTS



- Excellent English skills (C1 or above - non-negotiable!)

- Previous experience in content creation is a MUST

- Experience in content research and trend analysis

- Strong understanding of what makes content go viral

- Knowledge of Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts features

- Strategic thinking and attention to detail

- Ability to provide clear, actionable instructions

- Reliable internet connection and professional home office setup

- 100% say-do ratio and commitment to deadlines



HOW TO APPLY



ROUND 1: Complete our application form and record a personal introduction:



Fill out the form: 
/to/QRoz4WLV



Note: Put "CRE" + [Your Name & Family Name] in the "Name" field in the form.



Record a 3-minute Loom video introducing yourself (instructions in form)



Important: Please provide genuine, personal responses (no AI-written answers). We want to get to know YOU!



ROUND 2: Qualified candidates will be invited for an interview.



MORE ABOUT US



We've been in the industry since 2019 and have worked with over 3000 clients. We currently receive around 80-100 new clients per month. We provide an "80% done-for-you content & monetization system" that helps creators go viral and turn views into income using short-form content, AI, and proven strategies.



MORE ABOUT US



- About Young Publisher:

title: Client Coach (Giving Feedback): $1,100 USD START RATE
description:
Start rate: $935 a month + performance-based bonuses (TOTAL: $1,100 a month)



Paid every two weeks via Wise.



ABOUT US







Young Publisher is an international digital marketing company working with content creators and online brands.



BENEFITS



- Full-time position: 8 hours daily, Monday-Friday; 40 hours a week

- Flexible schedule: Choose your own hours, as long as you show up for the daily meeting (MANDATORY)

- Stable income: Long-term role with regular, on-time payments

- Supportive team: Collaborative environment without micromanagement

- Growth path: Opportunities to increase responsibilities and earnings

- 100% remote: Work-from-home setup



TASKS



Client Support (maintaining 40-50 total clients):



- Run kickoff calls with new clients using our proven script

- Review client content and give actionable feedback

- Answer client messages within 24 hours

- Host weekly group calls and 1-on-1 coaching sessions

- Help clients overcome content blocks and limiting beliefs



Progress Tracking:



- Update daily/weekly reports

- Track client progress and next steps

- Join daily team check-ins

- Ensure clients follow strategies consistently



REQUIREMENTS (MUST-HAVE)



- C1+ English (written and spoken) with no accent

- Strong communication skills

- Organized and detail-oriented

- Reliable internet and a quiet workspace

- Accountability mindset and deadline commitment



IMPORTANT



When recording a Loom video as part of your application:



- Camera must show your FACE & SCREEN

- Treat it as a LIVE interview with the Hiring Manager

- Have a professional background

- Have clear audio

- Wear business-casual attire



BONUS SKILLS (NOT REQUIRED)



- Content creation and social media experience

- Knowledge of Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts

- Regular usage of AI tools (ChatGPT, CapCut)



WHY JOIN US?



- Start rate: $935 a month + performance-based bonuses (TOTAL: $1,100 a month)

Note: More experienced CSMs earn between $1,800 and $2,500 after 6-12 months.

- Performance bonuses: Up to $900+ additional monthly based on:

- Client retention rates

- Task completion metrics

- Quality of feedback

- Team collaboration

- Payments: Twice per month via Wise directly to your bank

- Tools access: We'll cover all the needed tools

- Work-life balance: No graveyard shifts

- Professional growth: Regular feedback and skill development



HOW TO APPLY



1: Message us on OnlineJobs.ph with "CSM" as the message title

#2: Your years of experience with short-form content.

#4: One sentence on why you're a good fit for this role.

#5: Your portfolio.



Note: Messages that do not follow this format will NOT be reviewed.



P.S. Young Publisher is the recruitment company. Successful candidates will work under Social Influence Consulting LLC.

Young Publisher is an international digital marketing company working with content creators and online brands.

eting (mandatory, 3pm CET)

WHY JOIN US?

- Quality and clarity of feedback

- Teamwork and responsibility

- Payments: Twice per month via Wise, direct to your bank

- Tools access: All tools/software fully covered

HOW TO APPLY

#1: Your CV.

#2: Your years of experience with short-form content.

Note: Messages that do not follow this format will NOT be reviewed.



P.S. Young Publisher is the recruitment company. Successful candidates will work under Social Influence Consulting LLC.

title: Youtube Video Editor, Storyteller, and Designer
description:
VIDEO EDITOR, STORYTELLER & DESIGNER

Your Brain Explained | Part-Time



About the Role



I’m looking for a creative video editor and visual storyteller who gets genuinely excited about translating psychology and neuroscience into content people actually want to watch. You'll be the person who takes our evidence-based mental wellness content and makes it pop—crafting videos that educate, engage, and maybe make people laugh while they learn why their brain does that weird thing.



This is for our YouTube channel "Your Brain Explained," which is all about democratizing access to psychological tools and making brain science accessible (and fun). Think less talking-head lectures, more "wait, THAT'S why I do that?!" moments.



What You'll Be Doing



• Editing videos in CapCut (or similar, but CapCut fluency is a strong preference)

• Creating graphics, motion graphics, and visual elements that bring psychological concepts to life

• Collaborating on the storytelling arc—helping shape how I present complex ideas in digestible, engaging ways

• Cutting for pacing, energy, and retention (because even fascinating psychology content needs good editing)

• Optimizing content for YouTube (thumbnails, titles, descriptions, all that good stuff)

• Potentially creating YouTube Shorts and managing posting/publishing (bonus points if this is already in your toolkit)



What I’m Looking For



Must-Haves:

• 1.5+ years of professional video editing experience, ideally for YouTube 

• Strong design skills and an eye for graphics that enhance (not overwhelm) the story

• Proficiency in CapCut

• Portfolio that shows you can make content engaging

• Genuine interest in mental wellness, psychology, and how the brain works—you should actually care about this stuff



Bonus Points For:

• Experience managing YouTube channels, creating Shorts, and understanding platform best practices

• Motion graphics skills

• A sense of humor that translates well visually

• Experience working with founder-led brands or small teams where you wear multiple hats



About MYNDY & Your Brain Explained



MYNDY is a mental fitness platform that's all about giving people evidence-based psychological tools—think of it as democratized executive coaching. Our YouTube channel is part of that mission: making brain science and psychology accessible, practical, and honestly kind of fun.



I value:

• Research-backed content delivered in a human way

• Authentic communication over corporate speak

• Creativity and thoughtful iteration

• People who bring energy and ideas to the table



Details



• Part-time, formal arrangement

• Remote-friendly

• Opportunity to help build something meaningful from the ground up



If you're someone who lights up at the idea of making a video about why we ghost people or how feedback works in the brain, and you've got the chops to make it look fantastic—let's talk.



To Apply



Send us:

1. Your portfolio or links to recent work (YouTube content preferred)

2. A brief note about why this role excites you

3. What you'd charge for editing a 10-15 minute YouTube video



I’m excited to meet you.

title: CONTENT & OPERATIONS VIRTUAL ASSISTANT
description:
JOB DESCRIPTION

About This Role

I run a growing Amazon private-label brand and I need a reliable, switched-on VA to handle the content, design, and admin side of the business — so I can stay focused on the strategic side.



This role does not require deep Amazon knowledge coming in. What it does require is someone who follows systems precisely, thinks clearly when a situation is not covered by a checklist, and takes pride in doing small things well.



If you have used Canva, managed social media for a brand, and kept things organised without being chased — you are exactly who I am looking for.



Amazon Seller Central admin will be part of this role over time. If you have done it before, great. If you have not, I will train you properly with written SOPs and video walkthroughs. What I cannot train is reliability, sincerity, and good judgment — those need to come with you.



What You Will Be Doing

1. Canva Design & Visual Content

• Create secondary product images and lifestyle infographics using brand templates I provide

• Design social media posts for Instagram and
 — a mix of product content, brand story, and educational posts

• Refresh existing Canva designs seasonally or when products are updated

• Maintain a consistent visual style across all outputs using the brand guideline document

• Prepare simple A+ Content banner drafts in Canva for the founder to review and upload

2. Social Media Scheduling & Management

• Manage a monthly content calendar — populating it with approved post ideas and scheduling content in advance

• Schedule posts across Instagram and
 using Buffer, Later, or the platform's native scheduler

• Repurpose existing Amazon product content (images, copy, reviews) into social-ready formats

• Monitor comments and DMs — respond to simple questions using approved templates, flag anything else

• Track basic engagement metrics weekly (likes, reach, follower count) and include in the weekly report

3. General Admin & Operations Support

• Organise and maintain OneDrive folders — keep files named correctly, archived regularly, and easy to find

• Handle data entry tasks: updating spreadsheets, logging product details, recording supplier information

• Draft basic
s and messages using templates and instructions provided

• Research tasks — finding supplier contacts, checking competitor pricing, gathering information using clear search briefs

• Maintain a shared task tracker so the founder always knows what is in progress and what is done

4. Amazon Seller Central Admin (Trained Role — SOPs Provided)

• Assist with uploading product images and updating listing content following exact step-by-step instructions

• Help prepare FBA shipment documentation and labelling files when needed

• Respond to basic buyer messages using pre-approved templates

• Run simple reports and copy data into tracking spreadsheets

• Flag anything unusual immediately — you are not expected to resolve it, just surface it clearly



What Experience Is Required vs Trained

This table shows exactly what you need to bring and what will be provided:



Area Experience Required? How the Gap is Covered

Canva or any other design platform YES — must have portfolio Brand templates provided

Social media scheduling YES — basic proficiency Content calendar + SOPs provided

Amazon Seller Central admin PREFERRED but not required Full SOP + walkthrough training

General admin & data entry Basic computer literacy only Templated systems provided

Product research support NOT required Step-by-step SOPs provided



The Kind of Person This Role Is Built For

Skills matter, but they are secondary in this hire. Here is the mindset profile I am hiring for:



• You follow instructions carefully the first time — not after being reminded

• When something is not covered by the SOP, you use common sense and flag what you did rather than freeze

• You communicate proactively — if something is taking longer than expected or you are unsure, you say so before the deadline, not after

• You take ownership of your tasks — the work is done properly because you care, not because someone is watching

• You are consistent — the quality of your Monday morning work is the same as your Friday afternoon work

• You are here for the long term — not filling a gap while looking for something else



What This Role Is NOT

• This is not a high-pressure strategy role — that is handled separately

• You will not be expected to make decisions about the brand, pricing, or advertising

• You will not be micromanaged — but you will be held accountable through weekly check-ins and clear KPIs

• This is not short-term freelance work — I am looking for someone who will still be here in 18 months



Tools You Will Use

• Canva/PhotoShop or any other tools — for all design work (templates provided)

• Microsoft OneDrive — for file management, content calendar, and document storage

• Instagram/TikTok/LinkedIn/FB/YouTube, etc. — for social media scheduling

• Amazon Seller Central — for admin tasks (full training provided)

• Slack — for daily async communication and updates

• Trello — for task tracking and workflow management (setup provided)

• Microsoft Teams — for regular video calls and check-ins



Success Metrics — How You Will Be Evaluated

• Design quality: Canva/PhotoShop or any other tools output match brand guidelines without needing major revisions

• Content calendar: Posts scheduled and published on time — no missed dates

• Admin accuracy: Data entry and file management contain zero errors on spot checks

• Communication: Daily Slack update sent without prompting, questions asked before deadlines, not after

• Amazon admin: Tasks completed following SOPs with no skipped steps

• Judgment calls: When flagged issues come to the founder, they come with a brief explanation of what happened and what you observed — not just "I don't know what to do"



Compensation & Working Conditions

• Starting at 20 hours per week with a clear path to full-time based on performance

• Competitive hourly rate — discussed with shortlisted candidates

• Paid trial task before final offer

• Full onboarding and SOP training provided in Week 1

• Performance review and pay discussion at the 6-month mark

• Stable, long-term role with a founder who respects your time and communicates clearly



How to Apply

READ THIS CAREFULLY. Applications that skip steps or ignore instructions will not be opened — this is itself a test of whether you are right for this role.



Submit all of the following — no more, no less:



1. A short paragraph about yourself — who you are, what kind of work you do, and why this role interests you

2. A list of tools you currently use for design, social media, and admin work

3. At least two examples of Canva or any other design work you have created — image links, OneDrive links, or attachments

4. Your answer to this scenario (write at least 3–4 sentences): "You are scheduling this week's social media posts and you notice the brand colours in two of the images look slightly different from the rest. Your manager is unavailable. What do you do?"



IMPORTANT: The subject line of your application must begin with the word RELIABLE. Applications that do not follow this instruction will not be reviewed.

title: Short Form Video Editor
description:
We’re looking for an experienced Video Editor who takes pride in thoughtful, engaging work and enjoys being part of a supportive, mission-driven team.

You’ll receive raw video/audio along with clear creative direction. From there, we’re looking for someone who enjoys shaping content into compelling short-form videos (15–90 seconds) that feel natural, polished, and aligned with our brand voice.

We value clear, steady communication. We connect at least once per week for asset delivery, feedback, and revisions to keep projects flowing smoothly and on schedule.

We’re excited to find someone who wants consistent work, meaningful projects, and a positive creative partnership.

title: Virtual Associate for FA - 2026 02 Feb
description:
This is an entry-level role, where the majority of knowledge and skills will be acquired through on-the-job training, paving the way for advancement to senior positions.



Are you seeking a full-time, long-term career that offers exceptional growth potential through advancement opportunities, along with a stable income and bonus incentives? Join our team if you have a keen eye for detail, an unwavering drive for productivity, and a strong sense of responsibility. If you possess self-motivation, assertiveness, and a strong work ethic, coupled with a positive outlook and the ability to excel in a fast-paced work environment, we invite you to reach out to us.



You will receive training and support for your work. Candidates without experience but willing to learn and grow are welcome.

This is for candidates who are keen to develop a professional career that allows you to work remotely and independently. There are career paths with promising future opportunities that have traditionally been accessible only through conventional means. However, our embrace of technology, good jobs are no longer restricted to traditional ways.



About Us

The business has collaborated with a highly acclaimed loan brokerage and independent financial advisory firm, along with several other partners, all of which are fully licensed by government authorities. We offer a diversified suite of financial services and solutions with a personalized approach.



With these partners, we have one of the largest, most-respected, and fastest-growing networks of advisers in the country. We provide sound and comprehensive financial advice at both individual and corporate levels.



Requirement

• Strong verbal and written English skills with a neutral accent.

• Knowledge of Chinese/Mandarin, whether verbal or written, is a significant advantage.

• Exceptional talent for natural conversation.

• Proficient in Microsoft Office applications.

• Owns a competent Windows computer/laptop and android mobile phone for work

• A dependable and consistent internet connection

• Consistent and reliable power supply without frequent outages.

• A distraction-free and quiet workspace.

• Utilizing a headset equipped with Noise Cancellation technology.

• Takes initiative and works independently to address challenges, consistently seeking solutions.



Other Matters

We will be communicating via various communication tools. There will be a probation period for one to three months, depending on your qualifications and experience, which is negotiable. Upon the completion of your probation period, you will become eligible for a 13th-month bonus, paid time off, and a range of employee benefits, including PhilHealth and the Social Security System. The annual performance bonus is determined by your key performance indicators (KPIs). You will follow the time zone of the Philippines. Among colleagues, your working hours may be arranged in rotation, including weekdays and weekends. A total work week of 40 hours. Your further potential salary growth will be based on your performance, which may be increased during the quarterly review.



Loan Support

You will learn on the job to handle the primary job scope that includes:

• Engage with incoming leads primarily through WhatsApp on our business phone.

• Create comprehensive reports that incorporate inputs and details provided by clients.

• Create concise summaries and propose options for clients, utilizing templates for efficiency.

• Collaborate with the designated bankers to facilitate the processing of loan applications

• Schedule meetings with clients and bankers.

• Reach out to current clients as they approach the end of their loan lock-in period.

• Oversee client relationships and enhance processes through multiple CRM platforms.



Insurance and Investment Support

You will learn on the job to handle the primary job scope that includes:

• Prepare the required documentation for the client's application, available in various systems.

• Reach out to clients through WhatsApp using our business phone, primarily to provide reminders and follow-ups.

• Utilize WhatsApp (business phone) as the main channel to engage clients and schedule appointments effectively.

• Craft client proposals utilizing the provided templates.

• Helping clients with insurance claims

• Contact insurers to obtain quotes and provide recommendations to clients.

• Oversee client relationships and streamline processes through a range of CRM systems.



Candidates who have shown capability and knowledge may be groomed towards senior roles or management roles.



Application

To apply for the job:

Please log in and click the link below to apply, and please follow the instructions.



There will be an assessment and a Microsoft Teams interview video call required, if you are shortlisted.

title: Accounts Payable Specialist (Real Estate)
description:
*KINDLY READ THE INSTRUCTIONS CAREFULLY BEFORE YOU APPLY.*

title: Operations & Systems Coordinator
description:
About the Role 



Reports to: Founder / Chief Revenue Officer 



Our client is seeking an Operations & Systems Coordinator to support a growing luxury short-term rental (STR) portfolio in Austin, Texas. We are looking for an “orchestrator”, someone who thrives on building order from chaos, documenting workflows, and helping a founder step out of day-to-day operations. 



You won’t just execute tasks; you will design and improve the infrastructure that makes this business scalable. This role is ideal for a proactive professional who wants to grow into an operational leadership position. 





What You’ll Own 

Systems & SOP Development (Primary Focus) 



Process Documentation: Turn task notes into clean, usable SOPs and checklists for guest experience and property ops. 

Optimization: Identify inefficiencies and proactively recommend workflow improvements. 

Tracking: Build and maintain simple systems (vendor trackers, maintenance logs, escalation dashboards). 

AI Integration: Support the implementation of AI-assisted workflows and operational automation. 



Vendor Coordination & Property Operations 

Scheduling: Coordinate cleaners, maintenance, and specialty vendors (pool, landscaping, etc.). 

Communication: Use text/email for efficiency; make phone calls to US vendors when speed is required. 

Quality Control: Maintain vendor notes, pricing, and performance tracking. 

Triage: Handle maintenance troubleshooting and ensure timely resolutions. 



Guest Operations & Tech Management 



System Oversight: Manage AI messaging tools (Hospitable, HostBuddy) to ensure concierge-level service. 

Escalations: Professionally handle high-risk guest situations and flag risks before they affect reviews. 

Knowledge Base: Maintain property FAQs and internal reference guides. 



Admin & Financial Support 



Daily Reporting: Send structured daily summaries highlighting progress and bottlenecks. 

Finance: Support basic workflows, including vendor payments and expense tracking in QuickBooks. 

Growth: Assist with CRM hygiene (GoHighLevel/Vintory) and market research. 



Who This Role Is For 

You may be a strong fit if you:  



Have STR Experience: You understand the fast-paced nature of property management. 

Are a Systems Thinker: You have built or improved SOPs and workflows before. 

Communicate Confidently: Exceptional spoken and written English; comfortable calling US vendors. 

Are Proactive: You think three steps ahead rather than waiting for instructions. 

Are AI-Fluency: You use AI tools beyond basic prompts to summarize data and draft systems. 

Have High Discernment: You know when a process doesn't make sense and needs to be updated. 



Preferred Qualifications 



Hands-on experience with Hospitable (Highly Preferred). 

Experience managing or scaling a portfolio of multiple properties. 

Familiarity with QuickBooks, CRM platforms, or OpenPhone. 

Spanish fluency is a plus (for vendor coordination). 



What Success Looks Like Within 90 days: 



Vendor coordination runs smoothly with minimal founder involvement. 

A centralized "SOP Library" is documented and being utilized. 

Operational tasks are tracked in a clear, transparent dashboard. 

The founder is focused on growth and partnerships, confident that the "machine" is running. 



Compensation & Schedule 



Hourly Rate: $10-12/hr (based on experience) 

Schedule: Wednesday- Monday, aligned with peak guest stays and opportunity to increase hours as the business scales 

Full-Time: 30-40 hrs/week 



 To apply, kindly fill out this form:

title: We're Hiring: Bookkeeper (Real Estate)
description:
Do you have a sharp eye for detail and a passion for keeping numbers balanced? We’re looking for a Bookkeeper who thrives in a fast-paced, growth-driven environment and wants to be a part of a team that’s transforming real estate through innovation. 



This is your chance to join a goal-oriented and supportive team where accuracy, organization, and accountability make all the difference.  



If you’re looking for perks and other payoffs: 



1. Healthcare Package 

2. Annual Performance-Based Pay Increase 

3. Flexible Paid Leave – we trust you to balance focus and rest 



And you have what it takes to be successful: 



1. Strong organizational, verbal and written communication skills (Your “clients” include both Skymount and out stakeholders) 

2. Solid experience in bookkeeping or accounting, preferably with general real estate bookkeeping exposure 

3. QuickBooks Certification (required) and strong working knowledge of QuickBooks, Excel, and accounting systems 

4. Familiarity with classes and projects in QuickBooks (huge plus) 

5. Self-discipline, excellent time management, and resilience under deadlines 

6. A strong problem-solving-mindset, because you won’t just enter numbers, you’ll help identify financial issues, propose solutions, and work alongside leadership to keep projects on track 

7. Ability to work at least 6 hours per day on the night shift. 

8. Confidence in working independently while communicating clearly and collaborating with the team when needed. 



Then you can easily ace these duties and responsibilities:  



1. Recording daily financial transactions with accuracy 

2. Maintaining and reconciling accounts, ledgers, and bank statements 

3. Preparing invoices, track payments, and manage accounts payable/receivable 

4. Generating financial reports to support decision-making 

5. Collaborating with the team to ensure compliance and smooth operations 

6. Keeping clean, well-organized financial records 

7. Supporting audits and tax preparation when needed 



But wait, there’s more! (Not something you have to ace, to be honest) 



>Desktop/Laptop (i5 or Ryzen 5+, 8GB RAM minimum) 

>Dual monitors for multitasking 

>Windows 10 or newer 

>Stable internet connection (75+MBPS + backup connection) 

>Noise cancelling headset 

>Quiet, dedicated home office 



If you think you’re the one we’re describing here, then don’t just stare at your screen and grab this opportunity to be one of us! 



TO APPLY: 



Respond to this post 



Use Vocaroo to answer the following questions. Attach the link of your recording (NOT MORE THAN 5 MINS.) to your response or
. 



1. Imagine a client’s account doesn’t reconcile at the end of the month. Walk us through how you would approach fixing it. 

2. If you notice a financial or inconsistency issue that could impact leadership decisions, how do you communicate it? 

3. Do you prefer working independently or collaborating closely with a team? Why? 



Send us a copy of your latest resume for our reference. 



WE’RE LOOKING FORWARD TO HEARING FROM YOU! 



-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

WHO IS SKYMOUNT? I’ll give you a better one, WHY SKYMOUNT? 

 

At Skymount, our culture is more than buzzwords—it's grounded in deeply rooted values that shape every decision we make and every relationship we build. We believe in People First, always putting empathy, humility, and humanity above ego. Whether it's a teammate, a client, or a seller, we treat everyone with dignity and lead them with kindness. We live by a Growth Mindset, both our business planning and our daily showing up— challenging ourselves to learn, evolve, and become better versions of ourselves, both as individuals and as professionals. Radical Transparency is part of our DNA; we believe in open and honest communication to build trust, even when the discussions are difficult. And on the hard days (because they inevitably do exist), we dig in and tap into our Grit—refusing to give up, regardless of the obstacle in our way. These aren’t platitudes on a wall; these are the standard we hold ourselves to and the energy we bring to all we do. We don’t just work at Skymount—we live out our values together.

title: Paid Media Buyer
description:
***PLEASE READ ON HOW TO APPLY***



Job Title: Paid Media Buyer

Location: Remote | Philippines based ONLY

Salary: Php 100,000 - Php 120,000 / month (negotiable depending on experience)



We’re looking for experienced paid media buyers to manage and scale lead generation campaigns across Reddit, X 
), and Snapchat. You don't need experience in all 3 to apply, we are happy for a person to just manage 1 channel if that is where their expertise lie.



This is NOT organic social. We are strictly hiring buyers with hands-on experience running paid ads, optimising funnels, and scaling spend profitably.



Responsibilities

Plan, launch, and manage paid advertising campaigns on Reddit, X, and/or Snapchat

Optimise for lead generation and further down the funnel

Test and iterate on ad creatives, copy, audiences, and bidding strategies

Work with our internal team at the agency and you will have access to designers and UGC creators.

Scale campaigns responsibly while maintaining performance

Monitor performance daily and make data-driven optimisations

Provide clear reporting and insights on campaign performance



Requirements

Demonstrated success with lead generation campaigns

Experience managing meaningful ad spend (please specify budgets managed)

Strong understanding of tracking, attribution, and optimisation

Comfortable testing aggressively and scaling winners

Familiarity with regulated or sensitive niches is a plus (claims, finance, insurance, legal, etc.)



Nice to Have

Experience working with compliance









***PLEASE READ ON HOW TO APPLY***

- Platforms you’ve actively run paid ads on (Reddit, X, Snapchat)

- Examples of lead gen campaigns you’ve managed

- Typical monthly ad budgets you’ve handled

- Any experience in the claims or regulated spaces

title: Amazon Sales Supervisor
description:
About the Role

We are looking for people with a true owner mindset, not task-doers. Someone to take 100% responsibility for one or more brands, their Amazon presence and sales.

You will need to IMMERSE yourself completely in the brand: learn every product line and every SKU (and fast). THINK and ACT like the brand owner.

Spot opportunities, fix problems and drive growth without being told what to do next.

This role is fully responsible for RESULTS and is the driving force behind the given brand while being assisted by others working on aspects such as Catalog, Data, Inventory and PPC.



Important

This is NOT a robotic or checklist role. If you need constant instructions or prefer following scripts, this is not for you. We expect you to come with knowledge and experience; then study up and figure things out when you run into unfamiliar problems or when Amazon implements changes and launches new features. All of us do the same and in turn we share our newly gained knowledge and skills as internal training with the rest of the team.



Key Responsibilities

Fully own a brand or more: quickly master the entire product catalog and inventory

Strategically d
 when to launch NEW products and which ones will win

Maintain top-performing SKUs while actively debugging and turning around slow or failing ones

Analyze product + market to d
 on deals, price drops, promotions, and inventory moves

Identify and fix listing issues (SEO, keywords, images, A+, bullet points, etc.)

Continuously study Amazon algorithm changes and competitor moves to stay ahead

Provide clear reports and proactive recommendations to the team and clients



Qualifications

2+ years hands-on experience in Amazon Seller Central (US marketplace preferred)

Ability and willingness to fully immerse in a brand and think strategically across ALL areas (not just executing tasks)

Strong analytical mindset: you naturally spot opportunities and problems

Extreme self-starter: you research, learn, and take initiative without hand-holding

Zero tolerance for robotic or copy-paste work

Very good English to work with both our team and the clients' tea
mbers as needed

Ability to learn quickly and to put that knowledge to effective use immediately

Can work EST 9 am to 5 pm weekdays.



How to Apply (Important – only serious applicants)

Reply with:

1) Your updated resume

2) A brief example of a time you are proud of having learnt something quickly and putting that to use fast

3) A short paragraph (3-5 sentences) telling us about a specific time you independently turned around a struggling Amazon SKU or launched a new winning product. If you do not have such actual experience explain why you think you could handle a situation like that.



If you want an opportunity to make a difference and be part of an effective team, this is your chance!

Can you see opportunities where others can't?

Do just that, increase the net profit of the brand you work with and open the door to bonuses while having fun creating success with your team and becoming the key person behind their success.

title: Executive Assistant / Operations Coordinator for Real Estate Agent
description:
We’re hiring a high-level Executive Assistant / Operations Coordinator to support the founder and agents of a fast-moving residential real estate team in California.



You will work closely with 3–5 active agents, helping coordinate listings, vendors, schedules, communication, marketing logistics, and daily operations across multiple properties and transactions at once.



This is not a basic admin VA role.

You will act as a remote operations partner — keeping projects organized, timelines on track, vendors coordinated, and communication clear so listings launch on time and clients feel supported.



You will be virtually “shadowing” the founder throughout the day — tracking tasks, capturing follow-ups, coordinating people, and ensuring nothing falls through the cracks.



About the Company



RISE Homes is a boutique residential real estate team based in San Mateo, California (San Francisco Bay Area).



We specialize in complex property sales including probate, trust, and high-coordination listings that involve many vendors, timelines, and marketing steps.



We operate at a very high standard of organization, execution, and client service.

Our team manages multiple listings simultaneously across the Bay Area.



Your Core Role

Your job is to keep listings, agents, vendors, and operations organized and moving forward every day.

You will coordinate people, track timelines, manage tasks, and maintain systems across multiple properties and projects at once.

You are the person ensuring nothing is missed.



Responsibilities

- Listing & Vendor Coordination (Remote Oversight)

- Schedule and coordinate painters, stagers, cleaners, flooring installers, photographers, inspectors, and contractors

- Track listing preparation timelines from start to market launch

- Request and organize bids, proposals, and availability

- Confirm vendor appointments and readiness before milestones

- Coordinate lockbox, signage, inspection, and access logistics with local field staff

- Maintain listing checklists and status trackers

- Communicate progress clearly to agents and team

(You coordinate and manage remotely — you do not perform fieldwork.)



Agent & Client Communication Support

- Draft listing updates and status
s to clients and agents

- Track requests, questions, and follow-ups

- Assist with scheduling showings, inspections, walkthroughs, and meetings

- Maintain organized communication threads and decisions

- Ensure clients feel informed throughout listing and escrow timelines



Operations & Administrative Coordination

- Manage calendars across agents and listings

- Maintain task boards, trackers, SOPs, and workflows

- Organize Google Drive files and naming structures

- Track transaction deadlines and milestones

- Maintain vendor lists and service records

- Identify workflow improvements and organization needs



Marketing & Listing Logistics

- Track deadlines for print and digital marketing pieces

- Organize property media (photos, videos, floor plans, 3D tours)

- Coordinate property website and marketing asset readiness

- Support event and outreach preparation

Financial & Documentation Support

- Track listing invoices and vendor expenses

- Organize receipts and reimbursement documentation

- Maintain listing cost trackers and records

- Prepare documentation for bookkeeping

- Support transaction file organization



Systems & Platforms You Will Use

Our operations run across listings, transactions, marketing, and finance — comfort managing multiple platforms is essential.

Daily tools include:

- Google Workspace (Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Docs, Sheets)

- Slack

- Zoom

-

You will also coordinate information across:

- QuickBooks Online (expense tracking support)

- Gusto / payroll coordination support

- Stripe / payment coordination

- Banking / expense documentation

Familiarity with productivity and automation tools (Zapier, Calendly, Loom, ChatGPT, etc.) is a plus.



Required Skills

- Excellent written and spoken English

- Extremely organized and detail-oriented

- Strong follow-through and reliability

- Able to manage multiple priorities and timelines

- Proactive and self-directed

- Comfortable coordinating many people and tasks

Experience Preferred

- Vendor or project coordination

- Marketing coordination or admin support

- Bookkeeping or expense tracking support

Real estate experience is helpful but not required if you learn quickly.



Work Schedule: Full-time

Long-term role



This Role Is NOT
