title: Creative Strategist & Content Producer
description:
About the company

At Miraco Nutripharm, we are dedicated to advancing health & improving lives. Our goal is to relieve 1 billion people worldwide of pain & discomfort. If you know of anyone who has been worried about or suffered from any health problems, join us in making a positive impact by reducing the pain & distress others have to endure.

Job description

We're looking for a Creative Strategist & Content Producer to shape how our health & pharmaceutical brands communicate across both digital & offline channels. You'll craft effective strategies that translate scientific credibility into compelling storytelling & creative assets - helping us engage our diverse audience as we expand our presence regionally. 



The Creative Strategist & Content Producer will be the visionary link between our brand identity, compelling content creation & drive measurable performance across all key channels. This role is responsible for developing & testing high-impact creative strategies as well as producing content assets (visual, video, copy) internally, specifically designed to drive traffic, increase conversion rates, lower Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC) & drive overall revenue growth for our Shopify, Shopee & Lazada stores via social media as well as paid advertising platforms.



You'll work across multiple channels & markets to plan, create & optimize content that builds awareness, strengthens partnerships & supports the new channels of the business. This role is ideal for someone who enjoys balancing creativity, analytics & brand strategy in the health supplement industry. 



Key Responsibilities:

Creative Strategy

- Platform & Channel Strategy: Craft tailored creative strategies for B2C & B2B audiences optimized for platform-specific best practices & formats that align with brand goals & regulatory requirements in each market (e.g., Meta carousel ads, vertical video for TikTok/Reels, static product carousels for Shopee/Lazada e-commerce banner ads).

- Hypothesis Generation & A/B Testing: Develop robust creative testing matrices, formulate clear hypotheses for creative elements (hooks, calls-to-action, visual styles, copy length) that drive measurable improvements in Click-Through Rate (CTR) & Conversion Rate (CVR).

- Audience Segmentation: Translate target audience data & segmentation provided by media buyers into resonant creative themes, ensuring content speaks directly to different stages of the marketing funnel (awareness, consideration, conversion).

- Competitive Analysis: Continuously keep up to date with competitors & industry trends, identifying new & successful creative formats, hooks & messaging to finetune our strategy.

In-House Content Production & Execution 

- Performance Creative Development: Lead the end-to-end creative concept development & production for all organic & paid media campaigns (Meta, TikTok, Google/YouTube, etc.) that align with brand & campaign goals, focusing on high-volume, quick-turnaround testing required for performance marketing.

- Hands-on Asset Creation: Directly produce & edit native social content & performance ads using existing assets, stock libraries & internal resources. This includes:

i. Plan platform-specific content calendars: Cover educational, promotional & corporate communications

ii. Static/Image Editing: Adapt product photography, create ad variations & design simple graphics & banner ads

iii. Video Editing: Fast-paced assembly, cutting, adding text overlays, music & effects for short-form, vertical video (UGC-style, product demos, testimonials)

- Copywriting: Develop high-converting ad copy, landing page headlines & social media captions that align with the creative strategy & brand voice, with a focus on clear value propositions & strong CTAs.

- Asset Management: Ensure all campaign assets are correctly tagged, archived & deployed across relevant channels (Shopify, Shopee, Lazada store fronts & advertising platforms).

- Testing & Optimization: apply insights & analytics to refine & optimize content effectiveness across platforms.

Performance & Reporting

- Data-Driven Insights: Work closely with the Marketing Manager to analyze creative performance reports, identifying which creative variables are driving results (or failing) across Shopify, Shopee & Lazada traffic.

- Iteration & Optimization: 

i. Develop, adapt or review content & formats to improve engagement & performance

ii. Use performance data (ROAS, CPA, CTR, CVR) to rapidly iterate on existing creative assets & inform future strategy, ensuring a continuous cycle of improvement & optimization

Storefront Integration: Integrate winning creative messages & visuals onto the respective e-commerce storefronts (product pages, banners) to ensure a cohesive customer journey.

Multi-Channel Storytelling

- Content cohesion: Ensure content is aligned where possible across digital & print media, including LinkedIn, Instagram,
, YouTube, e-commerce platforms, brochures & trade materials.

- Tailor content: To achieve relevance & effectiveness across different stages of the audience journey — from brand awareness & education to conversion.

- Storytelling & visual consistency: To strengthen brand trust & recognition.

Compliance & Brand Integrity

- Uphold regulatory & ethical communication standards across all marketing activities.

- Ensure all content complies with regulatory guidelines & marketing requirements in each country we operate in, including product claims, advertising language & digital promotions.

- Maintain brand credibility by ensuring all communications are factual & aligned with company values.

- Collaborate with internal teams to review materials for accuracy, effectiveness & compliance before publication.



Requirements:

- 3–5 years of experience in creative strategy, content creation, social media, or brand marketing — ideally in health supplements, healthcare or wellness.

- Strong understanding of social media trends & platform best practices (Meta (FB/IG), LinkedIn, TikTok, YouTube, Google, Generative AI).

- Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere Pro), CapCut, Canva, Figma, or similar tools.

- Excellent writing, editing & visual storytelling skills — adopt a strategic approach to design that integrates marketing & commercial goals.

- Excellent communication, project management & cross-functional collaboration skills.

- Familiarity with regulatory communication standards or track record in health supplements or healthcare industry is a plus.



Please send your applications to

Variation issues, bundle/multipack confusion, listing changes.

FBA vs FBM seller mix and fee impacts.

Offer count changes



Amazon in-stock/out-of-stock patterns

High attention to detail and strong written English.

Organized tracking sheet updated daily



Consistent communication and accuracy (low error rate)

Provide: ROI/profit estimate, chart interpretation, risk notes, and final decision (buy/skip)



Pay



Hourly: $__4_/hr or



Per lead: $__1_ per qualified lead (valid, profitable, low-risk)



If you are this person please apply if not don't waste my timer and yours

title: Junior QA Engineer (API, WebSocket, SDK, Monitoring & Load Testing)
description:

Junior-level but highly curious and detail-oriented 

Enjoys learning how systems and business logic fit together

Familiarity with JSON

Strong analytical thinking and attention to detail

Willingness to learn complex business logic and system behavior 

Clear written communication for both technical and business-related issues 



Bonus Skills: 

Experience with API or WebSocket load-testing tools (k6, JMeter, Locust,  

Artillery Understanding of performance concepts (latency, throughput, concurrency)

Willingness to deeply learn business requirements, data definitions, and rules 

Ability to validate responses from a business perspective 

Comfort with validating calculations, derived fields, and cross-field consistency 

Curious mindset that asks “Does this make sense?” not just “Did it return 200?” 

Exposure to WebSocket testing 

Basic scripting (Python, JavaScript, or similar) 

Familiarity with monitoring or logging tools 

Understanding of authentication (JWT, API keys, tokens) 

Interest in backend systems, data quality, and reliability 



Why Join Us: 

Work on real-world backend and data-driven systems 

Learn how business rules translate into APIs and data 

Hands-on exposure to monitoring and performance testing 

Clear growth path into Senior QA, Automation, Data Quality, or SRE roles

• Maintain accurate call records

title: Video Editor – Affiliate Ad Content
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE

We are looking for a creative and detail-oriented Video Editor to join our team on a remote basis. You will be responsible for editing short-form affiliate advertising content for a variety of products. We are currently focused on TikTok but actively looking to expand to other platforms such as Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, and
. Our videos range from 15 seconds to 1.5 minutes in length, and we need someone who can turn raw footage and assets into scroll-stopping, high-converting content.



This is an excellent opportunity for someone who is passionate about short-form video, understands what makes people stop scrolling, and wants to grow with a fast-moving team. Beyond editing, we’d love someone who can help guide our expansion into new platforms and bring insight into what works across different audiences and algorithms.



WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING

• Edit and produce short-form video ads (15 seconds to 1.5 minutes) for affiliate product campaigns

• Apply creative transitions, motion graphics, text overlays, and sound design to make content engaging and on-brand

• Edit and optimize content primarily for TikTok, with a focus on helping us expand to Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, and

• Collaborate with the team on creative direction, messaging, and hooks that drive conversions

• Provide guidance on platform-specific best practices, trends, and content strategies as we grow beyond TikTok

• Manage multiple projects simultaneously and deliver edits on schedule

• Stay current with trending editing styles, effects, and platform-specific best practices

• Resize, reformat, and repurpose existing content for different aspect ratios and placements



REQUIREMENTS

• Proven experience editing short-form video content (portfolio or samples required)

• Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, CapCut, DaVinci Resolve, or similar tools

• Strong sense of pacing, storytelling, and visual composition for short attention spans

• Ability to work with product footage, stock assets, screen recordings, and UGC-style content

• Understanding of what makes affiliate/ad content perform well on social media

• Reliable internet connection and ability to communicate during overlapping work hours

• Attention to detail and ability to incorporate feedback quickly



NICE TO HAVE

• Familiarity with affiliate marketing or direct response advertising

• Basic understanding of ad performance metrics (CTR, watch time, hook rate)

• Experience creating content specifically for TikTok Shop or similar platforms

• Ability to source and sync royalty-free music and sound effects

• Track record of helping a brand or creator expand from one platform to multiple platforms (e.g., TikTok to Reels/Shorts)

• Understanding of how algorithms, formats, and audience behavior differ across TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and



HOW TO APPLY

To be considered for this role, please include ALL of the following with your application. Incomplete applications will not be reviewed.



Step 1: Introduction Video

Record a short video introduction of yourself (2–3 minutes). Tell us who you are, your experience with video editing, the tools you use, and why you’re interested in this role. Upload it to Google Drive, YouTube (unlisted), or Loom and include the link in your application. This helps us get to know you and evaluate your communication skills.



Step 2: Portfolio / Reel

Share a link to your portfolio or reel that showcases your best short-form video edits. We want to see your creativity, pacing, and ability to keep viewers engaged.



Step 3: Short Quiz

Please answer the following questions directly in your application message:

1. You receive raw product footage that is poorly lit and shaky. The client needs the ad delivered by end of day. Walk us through how you would handle this situation.

2. A 60-second affiliate ad you edited has a high view count but a very low click-through rate. What would you change in the next version and why?

3. What is the most important element of a short-form video ad in the first 3 seconds, and how do you approach creating it?

4. You’re given a product you’ve never heard of before and no creative brief. How do you research and d
 on an editing approach?

5. We currently post our affiliate content on TikTok and want to start expanding to other platforms. Which platform would you recommend we expand to first, and what changes would you make to our TikTok content to perform well there?



Step 4: Application Details

• A brief description of the tools and software you use daily

• Your availability and preferred working hours (Philippine time)

• Your expected hourly salary rate



TEST PROJECT

Shortlisted candidates will be invited to complete a short test project before a final hiring decision is made. You will receive raw assets and information, and we’ll ask you to produce a sample affiliate ad edit (15–60 seconds). This gives both of us a chance to see how we work together and ensures the role is a good fit.



The test project should take no more than one hour to complete.



?  Important: Applications that do not include the introduction video, quiz answers, and portfolio link will not be considered. We are looking for candidates who pay attention to detail and can follow instructions — this is part of the evaluation.



We look forward to seeing your creativity and the opportunity to work with you!

title: Virtual Sales Development
description:
About Kissy



Kissy is a premium, ready-to-pour espresso martini built for bars and restaurants that want speed, consistency, and quality without sacrificing taste. We help operators increase cocktail velocity, reduce labor friction, and drive higher-margin cocktail sales. We’re growing our on-premise presence and need a sharp, proactive Virtual Sales Development Assistant to support our in-field sales team.



Role Overview



This is not a generic VA role. You are the front-end of our sales machine. Your primary responsibility is to generate qualified meetings for our field sales reps with beverage directors, bar managers, and owners at bars, restaurants, and hospitality groups.



You will conduct targeted outreach 
, LinkedIn, Instagram DM, phone when appropriate), position Kissy intelligently, and secure in-person meetings for our reps to close. If our reps win, you win.



Core Responsibilities:



1. Meeting Generation (Primary Focus)



- Research target bars and restaurants in assigned territories

- Identify beverage directors, bar managers, owners

- Conduct outbound outreach via:

- Cold

- LinkedIn messaging

- Instagram DM

- Strategic follow-ups

- Position Kissy clearly and credibly

- Secure confirmed in-person meetings for field reps

- Maintain CRM tracking (HubSpot/Airtable/Spreadsheet)



-  KPIs:



- Meetings booked per week

- Response rate

- Qualified decision-maker contact rate

- Show-up rate



2. Product Positioning & Messaging



You must understand that we will teach you: 



- What makes Kissy different from generic RTD espresso martinis

- Speed of service advantage

- Labor savings

- Consistency in high-volume environments

- Margin profile for bars

- Premium positioning

- You won’t need to sell the deal — but you must sell the meeting.



3. Pipeline & CRM Management



- Maintain clean lead lists

- Update status daily

- Track follow-ups systematically

- Flag hot opportunities to reps immediately

- Build target lists by neighborhood, concept type, and account size



4. Territory Intelligence Support



Help field reps show up smarter than competitors by:



- Mapping competitive placements

- Tracking which venues carry competing products

- Monitoring menu changes

- Flagging new restaurant openings

- Tracking hospitality group expansions



5.  Sales Enablement Support



- Draft follow-up
s after rep meetings

- Send product decks and sell sheets

- Coordinate sample drop-offs

- Schedule tastings

- Assist with distributor introductions (where relevant)

- Maintain shared Google Drive sales assets



6. Digital Reputation & Social Listening



- Monitor social media for bars featuring espresso martinis

- Identify trending venues

- Flag venues with high cocktail volume

- Track influencers and bartender accounts

- Ideal Candidate Profile



MANDATORY: 



- Strong written communication skills (must write tight, persuasive outreach)

- Comfortable with outbound sales

- Not afraid of rejection

- Highly organized

- CRM literate

- Self-managed and proactive

- Understands hospitality culture (big plus)

- Familiarity with beverage alcohol industry (major plus)



Bonus:



- Prior SDR or appointment-setting experience

- Experience with restaurant outreach

- Understanding of NYC hospitality market

- What Success Looks Like



Within 30 days:



- You understand the Kissy pitch cold.

- You’re booking consistent weekly meetings.



Within 60 days:



- You are reliably filling our reps’ calendars.

- You’ve built a repeatable outreach system.



Within 90 days:



- You are contributing territory strategy ideas.

- You are improving conversion rates.



If you win, we win and you are eligible for bonuses.

title: Zoho Developer – Deluge (Work-From-Home)
description:
Company: 

We are an MSP (Managed Service Provider) in Australia, delivering comprehensive IT support services, including Microsoft 365 management, Cyber Security Essentials, networking, routers, and general IT infrastructure. We also operate as a channel partner for Optus, providing telco services, router procurement, and configuration, with exposure to data center environments. In addition, we deliver CRM solutions (Zoho) and custom development services.



Role Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled Developer with expertise in Zoho platforms, Deluge scripting to design, develop, and optimize end to end business workflow. The ideal candidate will have experience in customizing Zoho applications, integrating third-party APIs, and building scalable solutions to enhance business processes.



---Key Responsibilities---



Zoho Development & Customization:

Develop and customize Zoho CRM, Zoho Creator, Zoho Books, and other Zoho applications using Deluge scripting and workflows.

Build and manage Zoho integrations with third-party applications (e.g., Xero, Microsoft 365, payment gateways).

Automate workflows and processes to improve business efficiency.



Database & API Integration:

Design and manage database structures (SQL, NoSQL) for efficient data storage and retrieval.

Develop and manage RESTful APIs to connect Zoho applications with other platforms.

Ensure data security and compliance with best practices.



Technical Support & Maintenance:

Troubleshoot and resolve Zoho platform issues, performance bottlenecks, and integration challenges.

Perform regular system updates, debugging, and performance optimization.

Work closely with business teams to gather requirements and provide technical solutions.



---Required Skills & Experience---



Zoho Development:

Experience with Zoho Creator, Zoho CRM, Zoho Books, Zoho One.

Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.

title: Website & Branding Designer (Remote)
description:
If you're a talented website and branding designer who's passionate about creating stunning, conversion-focused designs using modern tools like Figma and AI-enhanced workflows, and you are based in the Philippines, this remote opportunity is perfect for you.



We are an Australian website & branding agency, Studio1 Design that creates world-class custom websites, branding, and marketing graphics for clients all over the world, using proven strategies and online marketing funnels to grow their businesses.



We're looking for a creative Website and Branding Designer who is excited to build a long-term career with us in the evolving world of AI-enhanced design.



Your Design Responsibilities:

- Create stunning, conversion-focused website designs for a range of clients

- Design custom branding, logos, and marketing graphics

- Use AI tools to enhance your creative process and speed up design workflows



Your Responsibilities

- Create stunning, conversion-focused website designs for premium clients using Figma

- Design custom branding, logos, and marketing graphics that convert

- Understand how to design systems and component libraries in Figma

- Use AI tools to enhance your creative process and speed up workflows where appropriate

- Collaborate with our team of website designers to bring our client’s vision to life



Note: You won't handle coding/development - our talented dev team handles that phase.



Here's What Makes You Perfect for This Role:



Design Excellence

- Outstanding Portfolio: Exceptional website designs, branding, and logos that demonstrate conversion-focused thinking

- Figma Mastery: Advanced Figma skills with experience building design systems and component libraries

- UX/UI Expertise: Deep understanding of user experience and conversion-focused website design principles

- Efficiency & Quality: Ability to work at a reasonable pace, while maintaining premium creative standards

- Modern Tools: Experience with AI design tools (Midjourney, ChatGPT, Canva AI, to enhance workflows



Personal Qualities:

- Excellent design eye with close attention to detail

- Self-motivated to work productively from your own workspace

- Experience working remotely and collaborating with remote teams

- Excellent communication skills, including strong English writing

- Enthusiastic about both creating beautiful designs and helping Studio1 improve



Your Setup Requirements

- Fast and reliable PC or Mac with sufficient processing power

- Professional home office setup with good lighting for occasional video calls

- Stable internet connection for seamless collaboration



What's In It For You?



Work-Life Balance:

- Work from the comfort of your own home, full-time, Mon-Fri, 8 hours per day

- Flexible hours within business requirements

- Regular weekly income paid directly to your bank via WISE



Professional Growth:

- Work with a world-leading website design & branding agency on high-level client projects

- Be part of an established, innovative design team embracing AI technology

- Opportunity to develop your design skills with AI-enhanced designs

- Continuous learning opportunities in emerging design technologies



Team Culture:

- Join a positive, upbeat team that treats each other with respect and gratitude

- Collaborative environment that values creativity and innovation

- Recognition and rewards for exceptional performance



Application Process

- Cover letter explaining why you want to work with Studio1 and your experience with AI design tools

- Link to your design portfolio showcasing your best website designs, and your CV/resume

- Review our core values and company culture on our ‘About Page’: on 



Selection Process:



If we like your application and portfolio, we'll invite you to a Zoom video interview.



If you are a successful candidate will start with a fully paid 4-week trial. If successful, we offer you a permanent full-time position.



Ready to Join the Future of Design?



We're excited to meet talented designers who are ready to embrace AI while maintaining the highest standards of creative excellence!



Thank you & good luck!



Greg & The Studio1 Design Team

title: Roblox Gaming Expert — Grinding & Farming Strategy Expert
description:
Seeking a knowledgeable Roblox gaming expert to provide expert guidance and hands-on support for efficient grinding, farming, and resource optimization across select Roblox titles. This role goes beyond basic gameplay — we need someone who understands game mechanics deeply and can develop and execute high-yield farming strategies.

Scope of Work:



-Analyze game mechanics, economy systems, and update cycles to identify the most profitable farming methods

-Develop and document optimized grinding strategies tailored to specific goals (currency, items, XP, event rewards, etc.)

-Execute farming sessions based on agreed strategies while tracking performance and results

-Advise on in-game trading opportunities, item valuation, and market timing

-Provide regular progress reports with insights, recommendations, and adjustments

-Stay current on game patches, events, and meta changes that affect farming efficiency

-Consult on account progression planning — prioritizing what to grind and when for maximum ROI



Ideal Candidate:



-Deep knowledge of Roblox game ecosystems, especially [insert games, e.g., Jailbreak, Blox Fruits, Pet Simulator, etc.]

-Experience advising or consulting for other players, groups, or content creators

-Excellent communication skills — able to clearly explain strategies and provide actionable recommendations

-Reliable, professional, and discreet with account access and sensitive information

-Proactive in identifying new opportunities as games update





To Apply:

Share a brief overview of your Roblox expertise, games you specialize in, and examples of strategies or results you've achieved. Describe how you approach farming optimization and what sets you apart from a typical grinder. References or portfolio links are welcome.

title: Account Manager - E-Commerce Agency
description:
Salary Range: $700 – $1,000 USD/month (based on experience)

Hours: Full-time, 40 hrs/week (flexible schedule, CET overlap required)

Type: Long-term, remote



About ULM:

We are a growing e-commerce agency that helps Shopify store owners fix Google Merchant Center (GMC) suspensions, set up new stores, and manage their online reputation. Our clients are store owners who need fast, professional support to get their businesses running on Google Shopping. We are a small, tight-knit team and we are looking for an Account Manager who will become the main point of contact for all our clients.



What You Will Do:

- Be the primary point of contact for all clients from onboarding to project completion

- Send proactive status updates to clients (especially during waiting periods when fixes take 3–5+ business days)

- Set clear expectations with clients about timelines, deliverables, and realistic outcomes

- Handle client concerns and complaints professionally and calmly

- Coordinate between clients, our operations team, and external partners

- Track all active projects using Notion and Slack, and flag any delays before clients ask

- Follow up with clients after delivery to collect feedback and identify upsell opportunities

- Manage reputation management client expectations regarding review retention rates



Requirements:

- 2+ years of experience in client-facing account management, customer success, or virtual assistant roles

- Experience working with international clients (preferably in e-commerce, Shopify, or digital marketing)

- Excellent written English - you will write client
s, status updates, and reports daily

- Experience with project management tools (Notion, Trello, Asana, or similar)

- Proactive communication style - you reach out before being asked

- Calm and professional when dealing with frustrated or impatient clients

- Comfortable working in a fast-paced, small-team environment



Nice to Have (Not Required):

- Familiarity with Google Merchant Center, Google Ads, or Shopify

- Experience with Slack and Notion

- Background in e-commerce or digital agency work



What We Offer:

- Competitive salary: $700–$1,000 USD/month based on experience

- Fully remote position with flexible hours (CET time zone overlap required for daily sync)

- Growth opportunity: this is a key hire and you will shape how we manage client relationships

- Small team where your work has a direct, visible impact

- 13th month pay and paid time off



How to Apply



Please include the following in your application:

- A short paragraph (3–4 sentences) explaining how you would handle a client who messages you angry because their GMC fix is taking longer than expected.

- Your most relevant work experience in client management.

- Include the word “UPLIFT” at the top of your application so we know you read this post carefully.

title: Appointment Setter & Marketing Coordinator
description:
Role Summary:

We are looking for a sharp and reliable Appointment Setter & Marketing Coordinator to join our performance-focused marketing agency. This is a hybrid role that combines two critical functions: aggressive speed-to-lead appointment setting and daily marketing operations management.



Your primary mission is to be the first point of contact for all new leads, engaging them within minutes to book qualified appointments. In addition, you will be responsible for daily monitoring of our Meta ad accounts, reporting on performance, and executing basic operational tasks within GoHighLevel.



What You Will Do:



•Own Speed-to-Lead: Your top priority is to call and SMS every new inbound lead within 5 minutes of their inquiry.



•Book Qualified Appointments: You will qualify leads quickly over the phone and book them directly into our sales team's calendar.



•Manage the Calendar: You will run a tight confirmation and reschedule process to protect the calendar and ensure a high show-rate.



•Daily Meta Ad Management: You will provide daily reports on Meta ad performance and be responsible for rotating weak ads with strong ones from our provided creative database.



•GoHighLevel Operations: You will manage all leads within their sales stages in GHL, execute calls and
s through the platform, and be responsible for setting up basic funnels from our existing templates.



•Maintain Perfect Notes: You will keep clean, detailed, and searchable notes on every interaction inside our CRM.



Who We Are Looking For:



•A Confident Salesperson: You are fearless on the phone and have proven experience in a role that required outbound calling or appointment setting.



•GoHighLevel Experience: You must have hands-on experience using GoHighLevel to manage pipelines, move clients through sales stages, and execute calls/emails. Experience setting up basic funnels from templates is also required.



•Meta Business Suite Experience: You must be comfortable navigating the
 Meta Business Suite and understand how to monitor and report on ad performance.



•A Reliable Operator: You are process-driven, highly organized, and can work independently in a remote setting. You have a quiet workspace and a stable, high-speed internet connection.



•An Excellent Communicator: You have fluent and professional English communication skills, both written and verbal.



Hours & Pay:



•Job starts at $8 USD per hour.



•There is strong potential for this to become a full-time position with quarterly raises based on performance.



How to Apply:

Please send your application with the subject line "Launch and Land" and include the following 3 items. Applications missing any of these items will be immediately discarded.



1. A 1-minute Loom video introducing yourself.



2. A paragraph or loom explaining your step-by-step process for managing
 ads that are showing weak metrics during a daily audit.



3. A screenshot of your internet speed test.



This is a long-term opportunity for someone who wants stability, growth, and real responsibility inside a growing agency. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Finance Manager
description:
Job Title: Part-Time Finance Manager

Location: Remote

Hours: 15–20 hours per week

Reports to: CEO (Mikey Caplin)



Company Overview

At Healthdrop Manufacturing, we help good brands make great products. We’re a full-service supplement manufacturer that partners with health brands who care — offering formulation, sourcing, and production expertise under one roof. Our culture is rooted in radical honesty, craftsmanship, and continuous growth.

As we scale, we’re looking for a detail-oriented and proactive Part-Time Finance Manager to bring structure, insight, and integrity to our financial operations.



Position Summary

The Part-Time Finance Manager oversees all accounting and financial activities for Healthdrop Manufacturing. This role ensures accurate reporting, compliance, and financial clarity to support decision-making and growth. You’ll work closely with leadership to translate numbers into actionable insights, so that the management team can use that data to make informed decisions and work to accomplish our company goals.

This role is ideal for someone who enjoys working independently, thrives in a fast-paced entrepreneurial environment, and takes pride in delivering precise, dependable financial data.



Key Responsibilities

Financial Oversight & Reporting

Oversee the general ledger, chart of accounts, and month-end close process.



Prepare and review monthly financial statements (P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow).



Maintain accurate cost accounting for production, materials, and labor.



Analyze trends, margins, and variances; provide actionable insights to leadership.



Support the CEO and CFO in budgeting, forecasting, and cash flow management.



Compliance & Process Integrity

Ensure GAAP-compliant financial records and reporting.



Coordinate with external CPA and fractional CFO for taxes, filings, and audits.



Oversee payroll accuracy and ensure compliance with state/federal laws.



Systems & Process Improvement

Refine accounting procedures and internal controls for scalability.



Document and implement financial SOPs.



Support automation and efficiency in QuickBooks, payroll, and reporting workflows.



Collaborate cross-functionally with Operations and Admin to align cost tracking and reporting.





Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field (CPA preferred but not required).



5+ years of accounting, bookkeeping, and financial management experience



Strong knowledge of QuickBooks Online, GAAP, cashflow management, and financial statements.



Proficiency in Excel/Google Sheets; able to build and maintain financial models.



Experience with payroll systems and cost accounting preferred.



Exceptional accuracy, integrity, and attention to detail.



Ability to work independently and manage priorities with minimal oversight.



Traits That Align With Our Core Values

Always Add Value – proactively finds opportunities to improve clarity, efficiency, or profitability.



Grow and Help Others Grow – teaches, documents, and creates scalable systems.



Deliver Quality Without Compromise – ensures every number, report, and process is right the first time.



Compensation & Schedule

Part-time (15–20 hours per week)



Flexible schedule with one consistent 4-hour block during business hours for communication and reporting



Eligible for PTO and 13th month bonus after 1 year employment.

mber

title: Multilingual Typesetting Specialist
description:
#### ---- ATTENTION ---- ####



ATTENTION - ALL APPLICATIONS MUST GO THROUGH THIS LINK (Log into onlinejobs to reveal application link): 



No
, Messaging, LinkedIn connections etc will be responded to



ATTENTION - ALL APPLICATIONS MUST GO THROUGH THIS LINK (Log into onlinejobs to reveal application link): 



###



As a Multilingual Typesetting Specialist, you'll play a vital role in our multicultural communications team. Your daily activities will include desktop publishing and word processing functions in preparation for online and print publication of clients’ translated documents. Assignments involve complex, technically oriented documents and involve the use of specialized software packages such as Adobe InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop, Animate, After Effects, Microsoft Office and Canva.



Key responsibilities 

• Review working files to ensure the package design files are complete and correct, including necessary links and fonts, and prepare the files for translation in our CAT tool. 

• Appropriately deal with font selection, line-height, kerning, text-overflow issues for foreign-languages for translated IDML files and during manual layout of bilingual tables to match English design files. 

• Mirror design layouts for right-to-left (RTL) languages and appropriately handle challenges faced in laying out RTL languages. 

• Recreate non-editable images in appropriate design software, ready for translation and desktop publishing. 

• Complete most typesetting projects reasonably autonomously, without extensive support from more experienced colleagues.

• Participate in daily, weekly, and monthly meetings with the Production team, to ensure that projects are on track for timely delivery.

• Input data accurately and in a timely fashion into our operational systems.

• Create final packaged design files and fonts in accordance with company requirements. 

• Escalate any issues or roadblocks in a timely manner to the relevant stakeholders or management.



Desired Skills & Qualifications

• At least 2 - 3 years of work experience, preferably in the translation industry 

• At least 2 - 3 years’ experience working with right-to-left (RTL) languages and complex scripts including Khmer, Burmese, Hindi.

• High proficiency with Adobe Creative Suite Apps and other graphic design software, Google Suite Applications, Canva and Microsoft Office.

• Understanding of how layout and formatting in InDesign impacts on the user interface of CAT (computer-assisted translation) tools.

• Excellent time management skills and interpersonal skills, capable of working autonomously as well as with different personalities.

• An understanding, appreciation, and passion for cultural diversity.

• Strong communication skills and grasp of the English language, both written and spoken.

• Professionalism and strong organizational skills.

• Produce work with a high level of accuracy and attention to detail.

• Alignment with organisation's core values.

title: Senior Residential Appraisal Report Writer/Manager
description:
I run a residential appraisal firm located in the Bay Area, California, and am looking for an experienced residential appraisal writer to join the team. The team includes 3 Bay Area appraisers and 6 employees in the Philippines. We are rapidly growing and are looking for an experienced and senior level residential report writer/manager to join our team.



Your role will be to do the following:

1. Complete the entire residential appraisal report after the appraiser has provided you with the inspection information and comparables. This includes all the commentary, adjustments, and all other parts of the report. We will provide training on how we specifically expect the commentary and adjustments based on our own personal preferences, however you are expected to already have this type of experience working for other appraisers.

2. Review the work of other report writers on our team, provide feedback, and help train newer report writers on our team. You are expected to act as the "last line of defense" of the report before it is sent to the appraiser for their final review before submission. As such, we expect you to be able to review the report, find any issues, correct these issues, and then send to the appraiser a near perfect report.



To be considered for this role, you must meet the following criteria:

1. You have worked for a US residential appraiser

2. You have experience performing data entry for residential properties in the US

3. You have experience creating the 1004MC, selecting comparables, drawing the sketch, labeling photos, making adjustments to the sales grid, and making commentary for the addendum.

4. Ideally, you have experience managing other appraisal report writers.



We are flexible with your work hours and offer Philippine daytime shift hours for your convenience. We would like to start part time but then transition to full time, so ideally you are open to working full time exclusively with us if its a mutual fit.



To be considered for this position, you must do the following in your application message (failure to do all of the following will result in your application being ignored):

1. How many years have you worked for a US residential appraiser? What tasks did you perform for them?

2. How many hours does it take you to complete one report? What parts of the report do you complete?

3. Do you have experience writing commentary for the addendum, drawing the sketch, labeling photos, and creating the 1004MC? Please indicate which ones you have experience with, and how many years for each.

4. Please provide a sample of at least one appraisal report you have fully completed. You can redact any private information from the report. Please let me know what parts exactly you completed on this report(s).

5. Provide a publicly accessible link to your resume.

6. Are you open to starting part time and then transitioning to full time? Once working full time with us, will you be working exclusively with us without any other jobs? When is the earliest you can begin working with us?

7. What are your preferred working hours?

8. Do you have experience managing other residential appraisal report writers? If so, please discuss in detail your job responsibilities.



Thank you, and I look forward to the opportunity to work together.

title: Shopify Store Builder (GMC-Compliant Shopify Specialist)
description:
Salary Range: $600 – $900 USD/month (based on experience)

Hours: Full-time, 40 hrs/week (flexible schedule, CET overlap preferred)

Type: Long-term, remote



About ULM:

We are an e-commerce agency specializing in Google Merchant Center (GMC) fixes, Shopify store setups, and online reputation management. Many of our clients need fully compliant Shopify stores built from scratch — structured correctly to pass Google Merchant Center reviews and avoid suspension.

We are looking for a Shopify Store Builder who can build clean, compliant, conversion-ready Shopify stores based on our internal framework and SOPs.

This is not a “just install a theme” role. You will build structured stores designed to survive Google scrutiny.



What You Will Do:

- Build Shopify stores from scratch based on our internal compliance framework

- Configure themes properly (layout, navigation, trust signals, mobile optimization)

- Upload and structure products correctly (titles, descriptions, variants, images)

- Create custom product images (basic graphic editing required)

- Set up all legal pages (Privacy Policy, Terms, Refund Policy, Shipping Policy)

- Structure collections, menus, footer, and homepage sections properly

- Ensure full GMC compliance (no missing policies, no misleading claims, etc.)

- Implement basic on-page SEO structure

- Coordinate with Account Manager for timelines and revisions

- Follow SOP checklists inside Notion for every store build



Requirements:

- 2+ years experience building Shopify stores

- Strong understanding of Shopify themes and customization

- Experience creating product pages and writing product descriptions

- Basic graphic design skills (Canva or Photoshop)

- Strong attention to detail (GMC compliance requires precision)

- Able to follow structured SOPs and checklists

- Comfortable working in Slack and Notion

- Good written English for internal communication



Nice to Have (Not Required):

- Experience with Google Merchant Center

- Experience fixing suspended stores

- Experience with CRO (conversion rate optimization)

- Basic understanding of product research



What We Offer:

- $600–$900 USD/month depending on experience

- Fully remote position

- Long-term stable role

- Clear store-building framework (you won’t build blindly)

- Small, focused team environment

- 13th month pay and paid time off



How to Apply



Please include the following:

- A short paragraph explaining the most important elements a Shopify store must have to avoid Google Merchant Center suspension.

- 2–3 Shopify stores you built (with explanation of your role).

- Include the word “SHOPREADY” at the top of your application so we know you read this carefully.

Applications without the keyword will not be reviewed.
